name: Jimmy's Adventure
description: This is a small platformer that we made at a 12-hour hackathon. The objective of our hack was to make a fun, simple platformer. We ended up making one, and although there are some mechanics such as power-ups that we could have added, we added different mechanics, such as a boss fight. We also added art that we didn't think we'd have time for. We hope you enjoy our first game on itch.io!
